description:
This update is so full of sexual tension you'll be jerking off on the edge of your seat. Heather Starlett and Tegan Summer re-enact the first time they ever kissed a girl. The chemistry and clear desire these two have for each other is so unbelievably hot, we left it as one long scene. This update is a holiday gift to you, members of FuckingMachines.com. A near 45 minutes of teasing, fucking and pretty blond girl orgasms from the machines.
Heather and Teagan are first year college dorm mates. They share everything - clothes, boyfriends, beer money. Heather has been crushed out on Teagan all semester and one particularly angst-filled, horny night she seduces Teagan.
title: Dorm Room Instigator
